Original: You'll accept this request? It comes
from a civilian... a missing persons
search, it seems.
[Page]
A few days past, a soldier exploring
the [Color:5]lake at the Scarlet Pillars[Color:0] failed
to come home.
[Page]
That is why the client needs an
explorer with a skyship to help.
Well... I await your swift return.
[Page]
...Forgive me, but you do know what it
means to go missing outside the walls
of Tharsis, yes?
[Page]
Tharsis soldiers can be identified by
the badges around their collars. At
least... at least bring that back.
Translation: You'll accept this request? It comes
from a civilian... a missing persons
search, it seems.
[Page]
A few days past, a soldier exploring
the [Color:5]lake at the Scarlet Pillars[Color:0] failed
to come home.
[Page]
That is why the client needs an
explorer with a skyship to help.
Well... I await your swift return.
[Page]
...Forgive me, but you do know what it
means to go missing outside the walls
of Tharsis, yes?
[Page]
Tharsis soldiers can be identified by
the badges around their collars. At
least... at least bring that back.

Original: Welcome back! I have heard the joyous
tidings! They say the soldier was
successfully rescued.
[Page]
We do not get many requests of this
kind, but when we do, it is rarely a
living person who is brought back.
[Page]
When I saw the nature of the request,
I said to myself, "Another one," and
had given up on the spot...
[Page]
It seems that when one does this sort
of work for long enough, one becomes
deadened to its effects.
[Page]
But thanks to you, I was reminded of
the work's importance. I am in your
debt, [Guild] Guild.
Translation: Welcome back! I have heard the joyous
tidings! They say the soldier was
successfully rescued.
[Page]
We do not get many requests of this
kind, but when we do, it is rarely a
living person who is brought back.
[Page]
When I saw the nature of the request,
I said to myself, "Another one," and
had given up on the spot...
[Page]
It seems that when one does this sort
of work for long enough, one becomes
deadened to its effects.
[Page]
But thanks to you, I was reminded of
the work's importance. I am in your
debt, [Guild] Guild.

Original: Welcome back. I was sorry to hear
what happened to the soldier, but I
am more glad that you are safe.
[Page]
Yes, this is the soldier's badge...
He could not have known of the hidden
labyrinth in the middle of the lake.
[Page]
You must promise me to be very careful
when you set foot in an unexplored
labyrinth.
Translation: Welcome back. I was sorry to hear
what happened to the soldier, but I
am more glad that you are safe.
[Page]
Yes, this is the soldier's badge...
He could not have known of the hidden
labyrinth in the middle of the lake.
[Page]
You must promise me to be very careful
when you set foot in an unexplored
labyrinth.

Original: As you soar through the sky, you see
something floating in the lake beneath
you and stop to have a look.
[Page]
Closer inspection shows that it is the
wreckage of a Tharsis military ship.
It may be the missing soldier's...
[Page]
If you hope to find the missing
person from the request, you should
search the surrounding area.
Translation: As you soar through the sky, you see
something floating in the lake beneath
you and stop to have a look.
[Page]
Closer inspection shows that it is the
wreckage of a Tharsis military ship.
It may be the missing soldier's...
[Page]
If you hope to find the missing
person from the request, you should
search the surrounding area.

Original: As you step into the cave, you notice
that the interior is a labyrinth!
[Page]
This is the only place left a missing
person could have gone... You take a
few cautious steps inside.
Translation: As you step into the cave, you notice
that the interior is a labyrinth!
[Page]
This is the only place left a missing
person could have gone... You take a
few cautious steps inside.

Original: You set foot into the hidden cave you
visited earlier.
[Page]
This is the only place left a missing
person could have gone... You take a
few cautious steps inside.
Translation: You set foot into the hidden cave you
visited earlier.
[Page]
This is the only place left a missing
person could have gone... You take a
few cautious steps inside.

Original: During your search for the missing
soldier, you hear a faint scream
amidst the loud croaking.
[Page]
There is someone on the other side!
If that voice was the missing soldier,
you haven't a moment to lose.
Translation: During your search for the missing
soldier, you hear a faint scream
amidst the loud croaking.
[Page]
There is someone on the other side!
If that voice was the missing soldier,
you haven't a moment to lose.

Original: You see a fallen soldier and quickly
rush to his aid.
Translation: You see a fallen soldier and quickly
rush to his aid.

Original: "Ungh... are you explorers? Thank
goodness... I'm saved.
[Page]
"I messed up while piloting my skyship
and fell out of the gondola straight
into this labyrinth... haha...
[Page]
"I wandered around, not knowing left
from right, and found myself here.
I was scared no one would come..."
[Page]
After hearing his harrowing tale,
you cheer up the soldier and treat
his wounds before taking him back.
Translation: "Ungh... are you explorers? Thank
goodness... I'm saved.
[Page]
"I messed up while piloting my skyship
and fell out of the gondola straight
into this labyrinth... haha...
[Page]
"I wandered around, not knowing left
from right, and found myself here.
I was scared no one would come..."
[Page]
After hearing his harrowing tale,
you cheer up the soldier and treat
his wounds before taking him back.

Original: You see a fallen soldier and quickly
rush to his aid.
[Page]
You try to bring him around, but his
spirit has already left him. It is
too late...
[Page]
Being sure to take the identifying
badge from his armor, you bury the
poor soldier where he lies...
Translation: You see a fallen soldier and quickly
rush to his aid.
[Page]
You try to bring him around, but his
spirit has already left him. It is
too late...
[Page]
Being sure to take the identifying
badge from his armor, you bury the
poor soldier where he lies...

Original: Though its conclusion was tragic,
the request has been fulfilled.
[Page]
You pray for the soldier's soul and
leave the area, your steps heavy as
you head to the bar to report in.
Translation: Though its conclusion was tragic,
the request has been fulfilled.
[Page]
You pray for the soldier's soul and
leave the area, your steps heavy as
you head to the bar to report in.

Original: You return to the city, carrying the
injured soldier on a litter, when a
familiar face approaches.
Translation: You return to the city, carrying the
injured soldier on a litter, when a
familiar face approaches.

Original: "Oh dearie me, those awful wounds!
This is the missing soldier everyone's
been buzzing about at the bar, hm?
[Page]
"Thank heavens! His condition doesn't
look critical, thanks to your aid.
Let's get him to the clinic.
[Page]
"Why don't you go tell the client
that he's back safe while I go do
that, hmm?"
Translation: "Oh dearie me, those awful wounds!
This is the missing soldier everyone's
been buzzing about at the bar, hm?
[Page]
"Thank heavens! His condition doesn't
look critical, thanks to your aid.
Let's get him to the clinic.
[Page]
"Why don't you go tell the client
that he's back safe while I go do
that, hmm?"

Original: You hear shouts from a group of
soldiers, who help Dalla carry the
wounded man away.
[Page]
He seems to be in good hands with
her... Your quick action has saved
his life. The request is complete!
Translation: You hear shouts from a group of
soldiers, who help Dalla carry the
wounded man away.
[Page]
He seems to be in good hands with
her... Your quick action has saved
his life. The request is complete!

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Noisy Marsh[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Noisy Marsh[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
